title: support compiling golang
body:
I was really hoping that the SA_RESTART flag work would have resolved this, but still getting errors compiling go apps.
Have tried installing go through linuxbrew (which itself mostly works) or from a downloaded distribution.

comments.body: I'm using go under WSL without issues. I'm using one GO installed using apt-get (works well) and other versions (including 1.7) using GVM. Can You provide some steps to reproduce your issue?
Just to clarify this is go v1.7
